creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: pounded indigo jacket with side vents; shocking pink and red edging up front and around neck 2"wide; 2 tape ties on front and on vents; shoulders and sleeve panels heavily embroidered with very imaginative and very colorful fauna including birds, tigers and fish; PR sleeve has tape label with numbers
title: Jacket
